unnormalised: Just a reminder, always keep your PAN card (e.g., ABCDE1234F) and bank account number (e.g., 123456789012) confidential to avoid fraud; your IFSC code (e.g., SBIN0000123) can be shared when needed for transactions. Also, be aware of UPI IDs like phone number @bankname (e.g., 9876543210@ybl).
normalised: Just a reminder, always keep your P-A-N card, for example, A-B-C-D-E-one-two-three-four-F, and bank account number, for example, one-two-three-four-five-six-seven-eight-nine-zero-one-two, confidential to avoid fraud; your I-F-S-C code, for example, S-B-I-N-zero-zero-zero-zero-one-two-three, can be shared when needed for transactions. Also, be aware of U-P-I I-Ds like phone number at bank name, for example, nine-eight-seven-six-five-four-three-two-one-zero at Y-B-L.
